title: Reap What You Sow
description: Alternate cover edition of ASIN B075JBZZB2Steve and crew have fought their way halfway across the country. They've faced Zombies, invading Koreans and their fellow Americans who are struggling to survive. This book in the series continues the journey and their mission to wreak havoc on the invaders and get the vengeance they so badly crave. As the old saying goes though, when you set-out to get revenge dig two graves...
author: R.S. Merritt
